title: Understanding Discovery Infrastructure
text: To understand how discovery infrastructure works on the PULL side, consider the different methods used to gather and update metadata. Think about how data is collected, how often it needs to be updated, and the tools that might be used to ensure the information is current and accurate.

title: Diverse Tools for Diverse Data
text: Given the volume and diversity of data, consider why bespoke tools might be necessary. Reflect on how these tools can be tailored to handle specific data challenges that standard tools might not address.
